ing: 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers (such as RO*TELÂ®)
1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chile peppers
des: "Casa Ole (a restaurant) refused to fork over their recipe for the green sauce they serve, so I set to work in the kitchen and came up with this. I think it's exact, but we shall never know unless we ever get them to relinquish their version. Mine is better! Enjoy sauce with tortilla chips."
ins: Blend avocados, sour cream, diced tomatoes with green chile peppers, cream cheese, green chile peppers, garlic powder, salt, and lemon juice together in a blender until smooth; refrigerate until chilled, about 30 minutes.
